column7: na wɔdze ananagya a ɔnnhyɛɛ hɔn ho mbra

column3: Iyi nye dza EWURADZE kae no
column4: dɛ hɔn a wɔtwe bɛn me no mu na mebɛyɛ moho krɔnkrɔn
column5: na ɔman no nyinara enyim na mebɛhyɛ moho enyimnyam. Na Aaron muaa n’ano."

column3: Aaron n’egya no nua banyin Uziel ne mbabanyin no
column6: hom nsoasoa hom nuanom mfi krɔnkrɔnbea no enyim nkɔ nseraban no ekyir."

column3: na wɔsoasoaa hɔn wɔ hɔn sorntar mu kɔr nseraban no ekyir; dɛ mbrɛ Moses kae no."
nye ne mbabanyin Eleazar nye Itamar
column5: Mma hom mmbɔ hom tsinhwi mpɛsɛw
column6: nkyii so mma hom nnsunsuan hom ntar mu; amma hom eennwuwu
column7: amma EWURADZE n’ebufuw ammba mboanofo no nyinara do; mbom hom mma hom nuanom
column9: ngyam ɔhyew a EWURADZE dze gya ahyew hɔn yi."

column2: "Na mma hom mmfi ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano
column3: amma hom eennwuwu: na EWURADZE ɔserango no wɔ hom do. Na wɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Moses kae no."

column6: aber a hom rokɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no
column7: amma hom eennwuwu: ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyinara mu:"

column2: "na hom dze he aato adzekrɔnkrɔn nye adze a ɔnnyɛ krɔnkrɔn ntamu
column3: nye adze a no ho nntsew nye dza no ho tsew ntamu;"

column2: "na hom aakyerɛkyerɛ Israelmba ahyɛdze a EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do aka akyerɛ hɔn no nyinara."

column4: ne mbabanyin a wɔkae no dɛ
column5: Hom mfa edziban afɔr a ɔka a ofi EWURADZE ogya afɔr do no
column6: na hom nkwetsi mbɔrkaw ndzi no wɔ afɔrmbukyia ho: osiandɛ ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn:"

column2: "na hom ndzi no wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn do
column5: wɔ EWURADZE ogya afɔr do: na dɛm na wɔahyɛ."

column2: "Na ɔtow nyan no nye ɔmado aserɛ no hom ndzi no wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔtsew; ɔwo
column4: nye wo mbabaa a wɔka wo ho: na wɔdze ama dɛ ɔyɛ w’ahyɛdze
column5: na wo mbabanyin ahyɛdze a ofi Israelmba hɔn asomdwee afɔr mu."

column2: "Ɔmado aserɛ no nye ɔtow nyan no wɔmfa nka ogya afɔr seradze no ho mbra
column3: mbɔtow no ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na ɔnyɛ wodze
column4: nye wo mbabanyin a wɔka wo ho no dze
column5: dɛ daa ahyɛdze; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE ahyɛ no."

column2: "Na Moses hwehwɛɛ bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkye no enyiberdo
column4: wɔahyew no: na no bo fuuw Eleazar na ɔnye Itamar
column5: Aaron ne mbabanyin a wɔkae no
column8: "Ebɛn ntsi na hom enndzi bɔn ho afɔr no wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔyɛ bea krɔnkrɔn no
column11: hom nsoa mboanofo no hɔn mbusu
column12: nyɛ mpata mma hɔn wɔ EWURADZE enyim?"

column3: wɔammfa no bɔgyaa no ammba krɔnkrɔnbea no no mu: ampaara ɔsee dɛ nkyɛ hom ndzi no wɔ krɔnkrɔn bea no do hɔ

column4: ndɛ da yi na wɔdze hɔn bɔn ho afɔr nye hɔn ɔhyew afɔr aba EWURADZE enyim; na ndzɛmba a ɔtsetse dɛm yi aba mo do yi: na sɛ midzi bɔn ho afɔr ndɛ a
column5: ana nkyɛ ɔbɛyɛ enyisɔ wɔ EWURADZE enyim?"
